      LocalSearchMonitor Solver.getLocalSearchMonitor()
      Returns the local search monitor.
      Methods in com.google.ortools.constraintsolver with parameters of type LocalSearchMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean LocalSearchFilterManager.accept​(LocalSearchMonitor monitor, Assignment delta, Assignment deltadelta, long objective_min, long objective_max)
      Returns true iff all filters return true, and the sum of their accepted
      objectives is between objective_min and objective_max.
      The monitor has its Begin/EndFiltering events triggered.
      void Solver.addLocalSearchMonitor​(LocalSearchMonitor monitor)
      Adds the local search monitor to the solver.
